subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: For the fourth time in four Car of Tomorrow races this season, a Hendrick driver ended up celebrating in victory lane, as Jimmie Johnson won the Jim Stewart 400.
snippet: For the fourth time in four Car of Tomorrow races this season, a Hendrick driver ended up celebrating in victory lane, as Jimmie Johnson won the Jim Stewart 400.
